name: formio-upload
description: A file upload server/proxy for use with Form.io File components

scripts.deploy: claudia create --name formio-upload --handler lambda.handler --config claudia.json --deploy-proxy-api --region us-west-2
scripts.update: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]' | sed 's/[\.]/-/g');claudia update --config claudia.json --version "v${VERSION}"
scripts.build: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && docker build --squash --build-arg CACHE_DATE=$(date +%s) -t formio/formio-upload:$VERSION . && docker build --squash --build-arg CACHE_DATE=$(date +%s) -t formio/formio-upload:latest .
scripts.publish: VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && docker push formio/formio-upload:$VERSION && docker push formio/formio-upload:latest;
